name: Witchalder
description: The Witchalder is a formidable plant creature resembling a diseased alder tree, capable of intricate movements despite its natural plant form.
memorable: Its ability to regenerate in sunlight and use poisonous pollen makes it a unique threat.
goals: The Witchalder typically seeks to ambush intruders and control its environment to deter or manipulate threats.
relations: May be found in the company of other plants and nature-related creatures, potentially serving as a guardian of its chosen territory.
environment: Often found in forested areas or places where plant life thrives.
strengths: Immunities to charm and poison, resistance to bludgeoning, and significant physical strength.
attacks: Uses powerful slam attacks and can grapple opponents, dealing significant bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Pollen Cloud can incapacitate foes within its vicinity while dealing poison damage.
senses: Possesses passive perception of 15, allowing it to notice threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in perception, enhancing its ability to detect nearby creatures.
additional_information: Can speak with plants using its Speak with Plants ability.
Appears indistinguishable from a tree while motionless due to its False Appearance ability.
Regains hit points in sunlight, providing remarkable sustainability.
Has advantage on saving throws against effects that would move it.
Can shape wooden objects, manipulating the battlefield.
test_queries: menacing plant creature that uses poison
plant that can regenerate in sunlight and grapple
disease-ridden plant that controls its environment
